tuv.seg: Whether you are looking for a sociable way to learn a language or whether you are looking to gain a particular formal qualification, the range of evening classes available throughout Ireland should provide you with what you need

Bíodh go bhfuil tú ag lorg bealach sóisialta chun teanga a fhoghlaim nó go bhfuil tú ag iarraidh cáilíocht foirmeálta ar leith a bhaint amach, ba chóir go mbeadh do rogha féin le fáil agat as an réimse ranganna oíche atá ar fáil ar fud na tíre
Evening classes take place during term time in Education and Training Boards (ETBs), schools, colleges and universities throughout the country
Bíonn ranganna oíche ar siúl i rith an téarma in Boird Oideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO), scoileanna, coláistí agus ollscoileanna ar fud na tíre
The courses on offer vary from centre to centre so it is worth looking around if you have a particular interest you would like to pursue
Bíonn cúrsaí difriúla ar fáil sna hionaid éagsúla agus mar sin is fiú go mór breathnú thart má tá ábhar ar leith a chuireann tú spéis ann
In general you need to enrol a few weeks before the course starts
Go ginearálta bíonn ort clárú cúpla seachtain sula dtosnaíonn an cúrsa
Enrolment takes place around mid September, again in mid-January and, in those centres with a summer term, around mid-March
Bíonn clárú ar siúl go hiondúil timpeall lár mhí Meán Fómhair, arís i lár mí Eanáir, agus, sna hionaid ina mbíonn téarmaí samhradh, timpeall lár mhí Márta
Normally, evening classes are advertised locally - for example in your local newspaper, community centre, health centre, school, parish hall, etc
De ghnáth, fógraítear ranganna oíche san áit - mar shampla, do pháipéir áitiúil, ionad pobal, ionad sláinte, halla paróiste
Your local ETB, college and secondary school will also be able to give you details on the courses that are on in your area and when they begin
Is féidir le do BOO, choláiste agus iarbhunscoil a thabhairt duit sonraí chúrsaí i d'áit agus dáta tosaithe
Education and Training Boards
Boird Oideachais agus Oiliúna
Since 1 July 2013, Education and Training Boards (ETBs) replaced Vocational Educational Committees (VECs)
Ó 1 Iúil 2013, cuirfear Boird Oideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO) in áit coistí gairmoideachais
All services provided by VECs will continue to be provided by ETBs
Leanfaidh na BOO an uile sheirbhíse soláthartha ag na coistí gairmoideachais a sholáthar
The majority of evening classes are unaccredited and, as a result, you will not need any formal qualifications to take part
Ní bhíonn teastasaíocht ag baint le formhór ranganna oíche agus dá bharr seo, ní bhíonn aon cháilíochtaí foirmeálta ag teastáíl uait chun páirt a ghlacadh iontu
However, if you are interested in a course that offers a particular qualification, you may be required to have some prior qualification or experience in order to be eligible

Má tá suim agat, áfach, páirt a ghlacadh i gcúrsa a bhfuil cáilíocht ar leith le fáil as, b'fhéidir go mbeadh ort cáilíocht nó taithí éigin a bheith agat roimh ré ionas go bhféadfaidh tú páirt a ghlacadh iontu
Get in touch with the course organisers in advance, to check if there are any academic or professional qualifications required for your course
Téigh i dteagmháil le heagraithe cúrsaí roimh ré chun seiceáil an bhfuil aon cháilíocht acadúil nó gairmiúil is gá don chúrsa
The only requirement for most evening classes is that you pay the fee in advance
Sé an t-aon rud amháin a mbíonn gá leis i gcóir furmhór ranganna oíche ná go n-íocfá an táille roimh ré
Evening classes are generally self-funding so the cost of your course will relate directly to the cost of the materials you will need
Is iondúil go mbíonn ranganna oíche ag íoc astu féin agus mar sin bainfidh costas do chúrsa go díreach le costas na hábhair a bheidh ag teastáil uait dó
As a result, costs may differ greatly from course to course
Dá bharr seo, is féidir difear an-mhór a bheith idir costas na gcúrsaí éagsúla
The ETB usually organises a registration evening where you go along in person, sign up and pay for the course in advance
Bíonn oíche clárú ag an BOO go hiondúil áit a dtéann tú féin ann chun clárú agus íoc as an gcúrsa roimh ré
Contact information for all ETBs
Tá sonraí teagmhála an iomlán BOOs in Éirinn anseo
